content: Compose an email from a hotel manager responding to a guest's complaint about poor service during their stay. The response should be professional, empathetic, and offer solutions to address the guest's concerns.

Subject: Apology and Action Plan for Your Recent Stay

Dear [Guest's Name],

I am writing to express my sincerest apologies for the poor service you experienced during your recent stay with us at [Hotel Name]. I understand that your expectations were not met, and for that, I take full responsibility.

Firstly, please accept my personal apology for any inconvenience or discomfort caused during your visit. We pride ourselves on providing exceptional service to all our guests, and it is clear that we fell short in your case. Your feedback is invaluable to us, and I assure you that we are taking your concerns very seriously.

Upon reviewing your comments, I have identified several areas where we can improve. Our housekeeping team has been notified about the cleanliness issues in your room, and immediate action has been taken to rectify this. Additionally, I have arranged for a thorough training session for our front desk staff to ensure that they are better equipped to handle guest inquiries and requests in a more efficient and courteous manner.

To make amends for the subpar service you received, I would like to extend a complimentary upgrade to a higher room category for your next visit, along with a complimentary dinner for two at our on-site restaurant. Should you choose to stay with us again, I will personally ensure that your experience is nothing short of exceptional.

Furthermore, I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss your recent stay in more detail. If you are available, I would be happy to schedule a call or meeting at your convenience to address any additional concerns you may have and to hear your suggestions for improvement.

Once again, I apologize for the shortcomings in our service during your stay. We are committed to providing a memorable and enjoyable experience for all our guests, and your feedback is crucial in helping us achieve this goal.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
General Manager  
[Hotel Name]  
[Contact Information]
